attributes.action: Disregard the votes of people in the 65+ age group regarding the brexit polls.
attributes.background: This is a petition to disregard the votes of those older people who voted to leave the EU and change the country for the generation to come and not for the generation that is coming to an end.

rejection.details: It's not clear how this could be done. Voting in the UK is anonymous. It is not therefore possible to work out which votes would be disregarded.
